<title level="1" right="Rules">[Narrow Surfaces](/Rules.aspx?ID=2369)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 423 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A narrow surface is so precariously thin that you need to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) or risk falling. Even on a success, you are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) on a narrow surface. Each time you are hit by an attack or fail a save on a narrow surface, you must succeed at a Reflex save (with the same DC as the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check to Balance) or [fall](/Rules.aspx?ID=2352).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
